title: Module 1: Add circuit breaker and parallel fallback for API calls
description: Module 1 has tech debt: No circuit breaker - if all APIs fail, requests continue trying. Need to implement circuit breaker pattern and make fallback chain parallel instead of sequential for better performance.
design: Add circuit breaker to stop trying APIs after consecutive failures. Parallelize API calls with Promise.all for fallbacks. Add monitoring metrics for API success/failure rates per source.
notes: Module 1: Stock Data API - Complexity 7/10. Issue: 72. No Circuit Breaker, 73. No Monitoring, 74. Hardcoded Priorities
close_reason: Redundant - modules 1, 2, and 3 are already completed based on user feedback

title: Watchlist: Cannot search/add MELI stock
description: We can load MELI (MercadoLibre) in the metrics tab by entering the symbol directly, but we cannot search for it in the search bar or add it to watchlist through the search functionality. This appears to be a data availability issue in the search/indexed stocks list.
notes: Fixed by: 1) Adding popular non-S&P 500 stocks (MELI, COIN, SMCI, UBER, etc.) to stock_universe_seed.py fallback list; 2) Adding manual symbol entry fallback in WatchlistManager.js for symbols not found in database
close_reason: Fixed by: 1) Adding popular non-S&P 500 stocks (MELI, COIN, SMCI, UBER, etc.) to stock_universe_seed.py fallback list; 2) Adding manual symbol entry fallback in WatchlistManager.js for symbols not found in database

title: Module 5: Add error boundaries and module lifecycle management
description: Module 5 has tech debt: No error boundaries - one module error can crash entire app. No module lifecycle - no cleanup on tab switch. Need to implement proper error handling and lifecycle management to prevent crashes and memory leaks.

title: Module 3: Enhance Watchlist with conflict resolution and advanced features

Need to add proper sync resolution, external notification channels, import capabilities, and analytics.
notes: Module 3: Watchlist Management - Complexity 6/10. Issues: 97. No Conflict Resolution, 98. Limited Alert Features, 99. No Bulk Import, 100. No Performance Tracking, 101. Simple Validation

title: Add conflict resolution for watchlist updates

title: Module 4: Implement automated data updates and validation for stock universe

title: Module 7: Enhance DCF with Monte Carlo simulation and export features
